Interface LifeCycleContext


  • public interface LifeCycleContext
    The context passed into the lifecycle callback

      Cache getCache()

      Used to load a resource from the classloader

    • Method Detail

      • getResource

        URL getResource(String resource)
        Used to load a resource from the classloader
        Parameters:
        resource - the resource to be fetched using the classloader
        Returns:
        the URL to the fetched resource, null if not found

      • getResources

        Enumeration<URL> getResources(String name)
                              throws IOException
        Load a set of resources from the classloader
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the resource that are to be fetched
        Returns:
        an enumeration of URLs to the resources
        Throws:
        IOException - if not found

      • getCache

        Cache getCache()
        Retrieves a cache handle
        Returns:
        a handle to the cache which allows add/retrieve operations for cache entries
